entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Snow or rain beginning overnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near plus 1. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Snow or rain ending in the morning then mainly cloudy. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 in the afternoon. High plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind south 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 24 January 2023
